explains: adj. 剧毒的；恶性的；有恶意的
wordGroup: virulent strain 强毒株；毒性菌株，有毒菌株

sentences.en: Now he faces virulent attacks from the Italian media.
sentences.cn: 现在他面临着意大利媒体的恶毒攻击。

sentences.en: A very virulent form of the disease appeared in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 该疾病的一种极其致命形式在比利时出现。

sentences.en: The media has waged a virulent hate campaign against her.
sentences.cn: 媒体向她发起了恶毒的诋毁运动。
